usage.cn: 明明是两个人的回忆，却只有我一个人珍藏。
usage.eng: It's only me who treasures up the memory which belongs to both of us.

usage.cn: 未来属于那些相信梦想之美好的人
usage.eng: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

usage.cn: 属于自己的，不要放弃；已经失去的，留作回忆。.
usage.eng: Don't give up the things that belong to you and keep those lost things in memory.

usage.cn: 命里有时终需有 命里无时莫强求
usage.eng: You will have it if it belongs to you,whereas you don't kvetch for it if it doesn't appear in your life.
